post:
SwissMade.HOST is a privacy-focused Swiss hosting provider for dedicated servers, VPS, cloud hosting, colocation and DDoS protection. We host our servers and network equipment at an ultra-secure carbon-neutral Interxion™ data-center in Zurich, Switzerland.

Why Swiss VPS by SwissMade.HOST?
  • enterprise-class VMware-powered solution
  • All-flash SSD storage
  • Linux/BSD/Windows OS
  • 10 Gbps networking
  • DNS hosting with PTR records
  • Free DDoS protection and configurable firewall
  • data & privacy protection at state, policy and infrastructure levels
  • ultra-secure data storage and processing facility in Zurich, Switzerland
  • premium networking with direct connection to SwissIX & SLA-guaranteed 99.9% uptime
  • strategic location right in the heart of Europe
  • green data center with zero carbon footprint
  • enterprise-class hardware by Supermicro®
  • compliance with ITILv3, ISO 27001, ISO 22301, FINMA circular 07/8

View all VPS configurations: https://swissmade.host/en/vps-switzerland

24/7 Live Support
We provide 24/7 support via live chat widget, support tickets and email. Should you have any questions or need assistance, you are more than welcome to ask: https://swissmade.host/en/contact-us

Swiss Approach
At SwissMade.host, we are proud to be a Zurich-based web hosting company that shares the most distinct features that Switzerland is renowned for. We guarantee that your orders and requests will be processed in accordance with our company's strict privacy, data protection, customer orientation and quality assurance policies.

Data Protection
Switzerland is renowned for its strict laws and regulations on privacy and data protection, there's hardly any other country in the world with a matching grade of privacy protection at the political level. Not only your data and privacy are protected by Swiss laws, but we also take weighty efforts to secure it at the infrastructure level. Our data center in Zürich is practically a fortress: 24x7 CCTV surveillance, perimeter and inner premises security patrols, multi-layered access barriers, including mantraps and biometric readers.

Payment Methods
We accept a wide range of payment methods including Credit/Debit cards, PayPal, Bank transfer, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash and many others.
